data.name: NavBarControlHotTrackedGroupCursor
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the cursor type used when a mouse pointer is over a group caption.

data.name: NavBarControlHideGroupCaptions
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether group captions are visible.

data.name: NavBarControlGroups
data.value: Gets a collection of objects representing groups of the NavBarControl.

data.name: NavBarControlGroupExpanding
data.value: Occurs when a group is about to be expanded.

data.name: NavBarControlGroupExpanded
data.value: Fires immediately after a group has been expanded.

data.name: NavBarControlGroupCollapsing
data.value: Occurs when a group is about to be collapsed.

data.name: NavBarControlGroupCollapsed
data.value: Fires immediately after a group has been collapsed.

data.name: NavBarControlGroupBackgroundImage
data.value: Specifies the image displayed as a background for groups.

data.name: NavBarControlGetHint
data.value: Allows hints to be customized dynamically.

data.name: NavBarControlExplorerBarStretchLastGroup
data.value: Gets or sets whether the last group in the Explorer Bar View is stretched to fill the NavBarControl.

data.name: NavBarControlExplorerBarShowGroupButtons
data.value: Gets or sets whether group expand buttons are visible within group headers (when any of the explorer bar views are applied. ).

data.name: NavBarControlExplorerBarGroupOuterIndent
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the horizontal indent (in pixels) between a group's edges and the NavBarControl's edges when any of the explorer views are applied.

data.name: NavBarControlExplorerBarGroupInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the interval (in pixels) between neighboring groups when any of the explorer views are applied.

data.name: NavBarControlEachGroupHasSelectedLink
data.value: This property is obsolete. Use the NavBarControl.LinkSelectionMode property instead.

data.name: NavBarControlDragDropFlags
data.value: Gets or sets a set of flags controlling the control's behavior as it relates to link drag and drop operations.

data.name: NavBarControlCustomDrawLink
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of links.

data.name: NavBarControlCustomDrawHint
data.value: Provides the capability to perform custom painting of hints in the VSToolBoxView paint style.

data.name: NavBarControlCustomDrawGroupClientForeground
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of a group client area's foreground.

data.name: NavBarControlCustomDrawGroupClientBackground
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of group client areas.

data.name: NavBarControlCustomDrawGroupCaption
data.value: Provides the ability to perform custom painting of group captions.

data.name: NavBarControlCustomDrawBackground
data.value: Provides the capability to custom paint the control's background.

data.name: NavBarControlContentButtonHint
data.value: Gets or sets the content button's hint.

data.name: NavBarControlCalcHintSize
data.value: Allows you to assign a custom hint size before a hint is displayed in the VSToolBoxView paint style.

data.name: NavBarControlBorderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the border style of the NavBarControl.

data.name: NavBarControlBeforeLoadLayout
data.value: Occurs before a layout is restored from storage (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: NavBarControlAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the NavBarControl's elements.

data.name: NavBarControlAllowSelectedLink
data.value: This property is obsolete. Use the NavBarControl.LinkSelectionMode property instead.

data.name: NavBarControlAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether all items within the current NavBarControl should paint their icons in the items' foreground colors.

data.name: NavBarControlActiveGroupName
data.value: This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and cannot be used directly from your code.

data.name: NavBarControlActiveGroupChanged
data.value: Fires when the active group changes.

data.name: NavBarControlActiveGroup
data.value: Returns an object representing the currently active group.

data.name: ComponentCollectionItemItemChanged
data.value: Fires when item property values are changed.

data.name: NavBarControlLinkClicked
data.value: Fires immediately after a link has been clicked.

data.name: NavBarControlLayoutUpgrade
data.value: Occurs after a layout whose version doesn't match the current layout version has been loaded from a stream, xml file or system registry.

data.name: NavBarControlLargeImages
data.value: Gets or sets an object that serves as the source of large images used in the NavBarControl.

data.name: NavBarControlItems
data.value: Gets the collection of items within the NavBarControl control.

data.name: NavBarControlHotTrackedLinkChanged
data.value: Fires when the mouse pointer either enters or leaves a link area.

data.name: NavBarControlHotTrackedItemCursor
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the cursor type used when a mouse pointer is over a group caption.

data.name: NavBarControlLinkInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the interval (in pixels) between neighboring links in a group.

data.name: NavBarControlLinkPressed
data.value: Fires immediately after a link has been pressed.

data.name: NavBarControlLinkSelectionMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether link selection is enabled and whether each group or only one group can contain a selected link simultaneously.

data.name: NavBarControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings which control the NavBarControl's look and feel.

data.name: NavBarControlMenuManager
data.value: Gets or sets an object that controls the look and feel of the control's popup menus.

data.name: NavBarControlNavDragDrop
data.value: Fires immediately after a link has been dropped.

data.name: NavBarControlNavDragOver
data.value: Fires repeatedly when a link is being dragged and is allowed to be dropped.

data.name: NavBarControlNavigationPaneGroupClientHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the default minimum height of the client area for the active group when the \"NavigationPane\" view is applied.

data.name: NavBarControlNavigationPaneMaxVisibleGroups
data.value: Gets the maximum number of groups for which buttons are displayed within a NavBarControl when the \"NavigationPane\" view is applied.

data.name: NavBarControlNavigationPaneOverflowPanelUseSmallImages
data.value: Gets or sets whether groups in the Overflow panel are represented by small or large icons.

data.name: NavBarControlNavPaneMinimizedGroupFormShowing
data.value: Occurs when a minimized NavBarGroup within a Navigation Pane View is expanded.

data.name: NavBarControlNavPaneOptionsApplyGroupFont
data.value: Allows you to apply a font to a group after font settings have been changed by an end-user via the Navigation Pane Options dialog.

data.name: NavBarControlNavPaneOptionsCanEditGroupFont
data.value: Allows you to specify whether an end-user can edit font settings for individual groups via the Navigation Pane Options dialog.

data.name: NavBarControlNavPaneOptionsReset
data.value: Fires when the Reset button in the Navigation Pane Options dialog is clicked.

data.name: NavBarControlNavPaneStateChanged
data.value: Fires after the NavBarControl's expansion state has been changed (in the NavigationPane paint style).

data.name: NavBarControlOptionsLayout
data.value: Contains options that control how the NavBarControl's layout is stored to/restored from a stream, xml file or system registry.

data.name: NavBarControlOptionsNavPane
data.value: Contains options that determine the appearance and behavior of the NavBarControl when the NavigationPane paint style is applied.

data.name: NavBarControlPaintStyleKind
data.value: Gets or sets the kind of the NavBarControl's paint style.

data.name: NavBarControlPaintStyleName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the paint style applied to the NavBarControl.

data.name: NavBarControlSelectedLinkChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after a link has been selected.

data.name: NavBarControlSelectLinkOnPress
data.value: Gets or sets whether a link is selected on the MouseDown or MouseUp event.

data.name: NavBarControlSharedImageCollectionImageSizeMode
data.value: Gets or sets the value that specifies how the display size of images is determined when the images are obtained from a SharedImageCollection.

data.name: NavBarControlShowGroupHint
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether group hints are displayed.

data.name: NavBarControlShowHintInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval after the mouse pointer stops over an element and before its hint is displayed.

data.name: NavBarControlShowLinkHint
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether link hints are displayed.

data.name: NavBarControlSkinExplorerBarViewScrollStyle
data.value: Gets or sets how the control is scrolled when a skinning Explorer Bar View paint scheme is applied.

data.name: NavBarControlSmallImages
data.value: Gets or sets an object that serves as the source of small images used in the NavBarControl.

data.name: NavBarControlTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can focus this control using the TAB key.

data.name: NavBarControlToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and the content of the hints displayed by the XtraNavBar control.

data.name: NavBarGroupAppearanceBackground
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the group's background.

data.name: NavBarGroupBackgroundImage
data.value: Gets or sets the group's background image.

data.name: NavBarGroupCalcGroupClientHeight
data.value: Fires when the group's client height is calculated.

data.name: NavBarGroupCollapsedNavPaneContentControl
data.value: Gets or sets the control embedded into the NavBarControl when the nav bar is painted using the Navigation Pane View, the current group is active and the nav bar is collapsed.

data.name: NavBarGroupControlContainerOwnerGroup
data.value: Gets the group that owns the current control container.

data.name: NavBarGroupControlContainerTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user can focus this control using the TAB key.

data.name: NavBarGroupDragDropFlags
data.value: Gets or sets a set of flags controlling the group's behavior as it relates to link drag and drop operations.

data.name: NavBarGroupExpanded
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the group is expanded.

data.name: NavBarGroupGroupCaptionUseImage
data.value: Gets or sets whether a big or small image is displayed within the group caption.

data.name: NavBarGroupGroupClientHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of the group's client area.

data.name: NavBarGroupGroupStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the way links are displayed within the current group, or whether to display a custom control within the group.

data.name: NavBarGroupNavigationPaneVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the group's button is displayed at the bottom of the NavBarControl when the \"NavigationPane\" view is applied.

data.name: NavBarGroupSelectedLinkIndex
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the index of the group's selected link.

data.name: NavBarGroupTopVisibleLinkIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the link which is displayed at the top of the current group.

data.name: NavBarItemAllowAutoSelect
data.value: Gets or sets whether auto-selection is enabled for all links of the current NavBarItem. This property is in effect in the LinkSelectionModeType.OneInGroupAndAllowAutoSelect mode.

data.name: NavBarItemAppearanceDisabled
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the disabled item's link(s).

data.name: NavBarItemCanDrag
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether an item can be dragged.

data.name: NavBarItemEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether an item responds to user actions.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkAllowAutoSelect
data.value: Gets or sets whether the auto-selection feature is enabled for the current link. This property is in effect in LinkSelectionModeType.OneInGroupAndAllowAutoSelect mode for the Navigation Pane View and the Side Bar View.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkCaption
data.value: Gets the link's caption.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkClicked
data.value: Fires immediately after an item has been clicked.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkGroup
data.value: Gets an object representing the group to which a link corresponds.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkItem
data.value: Gets an object representing the item to which the link corresponds.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkItemChanged
data.value: Fires when the link's properties change.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkNavBar
data.value: Returns the NavBarControl control to which the link belongs.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkPressed
data.value: Fires immediately after a user pressed the item.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkVisible
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the link is visible.

data.name: NavBarItemLinkVisibleChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after the visibility of the item link has been changed.

data.name: NavBarLayoutOptionsStoreAppearance
data.value: Gets or sets whether the items' appearance settings are also stored when the layout is saved to storage, and restored when the layout is restored from storage.

data.name: NavElementAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current NavElement's icon should be painted in this item's foreground color.

data.name: NavElementAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the element.

data.name: NavElementAppearanceHotTracked
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the current element when it's hot-tracked.

data.name: NavElementAppearancePressed
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the element when it's pressed.

data.name: NavElementCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the element's caption.

data.name: NavElementHint
data.value: Gets or sets the element's hint text.

data.name: NavElementImageUri
data.value: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier of the image in the DX Image Gallery displayed in the current NavElement. A specific version of the addressed image is automatically chosen, based on the app context (the current skin and required image size).

data.name: NavElementLargeImage
data.value: Specifies the large image displayed within the element.

data.name: NavElementLargeImageIndex
data.value: Specifies the element's large image by its index within the source image collection.

data.name: NavElementLargeImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the current NavElement's large image.

data.name: NavElementSmallImage
data.value: Specifies the small image displayed within the element.

data.name: NavElementSmallImageIndex
data.value: Specifies the element's small image by its index within the source image collection.

data.name: NavElementSmallImageSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size for the current NavElement's small image.

data.name: NavElementSuperTip
data.value: Gets or sets a super tool-tip for the current NavElement.

data.name: NavElementTag
data.value: Gets or sets data associated with the element.

data.name: NavElementVisible
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the visibility of the element.

data.name: NavGroupCollectionItem
data.value: Gets an item of the collection by its name.

data.name: NavItemCollectionItem
data.value: Gets an item of the collection by its name.

data.name: NavLinkCollectionItem
data.value: Gets an item of the collection by its index.

data.name: NavReadOnlyLinkCollectionItem
data.value: Gets the item of the collection by its index.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneAllowOptionsMenuItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can invoke the Navigation Pane Options dialog to customize the order of groups and font settings of items.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneAnimationFramesCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of animation frames when the control is being expanded or collapsed.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneCollapsedNavPaneContentControl
data.value: Gets or sets the control embedded into the NavBarControl when the nav bar is painted using the Navigation Pane View and the nav bar is collapsed.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneCollapsedWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the control's width when in the collapsed state.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneExpandButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets the direction of the expand button's arrow and also the direction in which the control is collapsed/expanded.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneExpandedWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the control's width when in the expanded state.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneMaxPopupFormWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum width of the popup form displayed when clicking the active NavBarGroup in the collapsed NavBarControl.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneNavPaneState
data.value: Gets or sets the NavBarControl's expansion state when the NavigationPane paint style is applied.

data.name: OptionsNavPanePopupFormSize
data.value: Gets or sets the popup form's size.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneShowExpandButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the expand button is visible when the NavigationPane paint style is applied.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneShowGroupImageInHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the active group's image in the NavBarControl's header.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneShowHeaderText
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the active group's caption in the NavBarControl's header.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneShowOverflowButton
data.value: Gets or sets the visibility of the overflow button displayed within the Navigation Pane Overflow Panel.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneShowOverflowPanel
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Overflow panel is displayed.

data.name: OptionsNavPaneShowSplitter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Navigation Pane Splitter is visible.
